name: Brother's Location - Custom Night
description:
Brother's Location is a FNAF UCN fan made game. I took most of my brother's fan made characters and put them in a game (there are others made by me, but no one cares XD) You can change their difficulty and choose any of the challenges, then face them in the factory.

The online version and credits are found here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/238577218/#player 

You may need Scratch 2.0 installed to run the game. The link is here: https://scratch.mit.edu/download

To play the game, press the blue window button at the top left corner. Then, click the green flag at the top right to start and restart the game.
